nodes.text: Gevil Flan owned a warehouse on the planet Fait d'Fait during the Galactic Civil War. The Alliance agent and racer Siro Simito used Flan's warehouse when stopping over on Fait d'Fait. He was aware of Simito's identity and the fact that he should be racing rather than conducting business on-planet but did not betray Simito due to his family connections as a member of the Vallaido pirate clan.
